EmailTemplate.name: Alert Notification
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying configured user(s) when an Alert has been acted upon.

Argument.name: alert
Argument.Description: The alert object being acted upon.

Argument.name: alertDefinitionName
Argument.Description: Name of the Alert Definition triggering the action.

Argument.name: errorMessage
Argument.Description: Optional message containing more meaningful insight upon error

EmailTemplate.Subject: Alert Notification
